type.name: Find
type.summary:
Finds time series values on a specific date.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: First record in the series on the date specified.

type.name: Prune
type.summary:
Removes a specific quantity from the beginning of the time series list.
See documentation for more information.

type.name: Sync
type.summary:
Forces a time series to have the same date-based records as another time series baseline.
This utility is undocumented.
type.typeparam: Any time series type to be transformed.
Any time series type to be matched.
type.param: The time series to be modified.
Synchronization behavior See options in SyncType enum.
